Option.text: I seek the Hammer of Kromos!
You are a man a few words.

SpeechNode.text: Words mean nothing. Action means everything.
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir3

Option.text: Isn't the name of a Weapon?
You are named after a weapon?
WHAT RELATION DO YOU HAVE WITH GUNGNIR?

SpeechNode.text: No relation, the Weapon was named after me.
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir8

Option.text: Your Grace, I have so many questions!-

SpeechNode.text: Seek and discover answers throughout your journey. I cannot interfere with your life.
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir10

Option.text: I don't get it, why are you here if you can't help?

SpeechNode.text: I wish to see Kromos give his power to the worthy. I have waited for an eternity...
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir11

Option.text: I have the Ryza Sword, will that help?

SpeechNode.text: It might, Kromos wants a Champion to rebuild Valest. I hope he chooses well....
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir12

Option.text: But I came here for the Hammer

SpeechNode.text: Then you have chosen your path. Good luck to you Aeona.
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir13

Option.text: But how do you know my name?

SpeechNode.text: As I said, I have waited an eternity to see this moment...
SpeechNode.name: Gungnir14
